title: Chapter 14: Building Vision-Language-Action (VLA) Pipelines
description: We've now explored the key components of an intelligent robotics system: vision (perception), language (speech recognition and understanding), and action (robot control). The final step is to integrate these components into a cohesive Vision-Language-Action (VLA) pipeline, which is the architecture that brings everything together to create a truly interactive and intelligent robot.
